tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE health_records (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  date_of_visit DATE,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment_plan TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_health_records (
  patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  health_condition VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name TEXT,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender TEXT,
  address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE health_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  record_date DATE,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  prescription TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE medical_staff (
  staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  staff_name TEXT,
  specialization TEXT,
  contact_number TEXT,
  email TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE health_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
  prescription VARCHAR(200),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  provider_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  reason VARCHAR(200),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES providers(provider_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_age INT,
    patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
    patient_address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE encounters (
    encounter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    encounter_date DATE,
    encounter_type VARCHAR(20),
    encounter_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE diagnoses (
    diagnosis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    diagnosis_date DATE,
    diagnosis_code VARCHAR(10),
    diagnosis_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE medications (
    medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    medication_name VARCHAR(50),
    medication_dosage VARCHAR(20),
    medication_instructions TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE providers (
    provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(50),
    provider_specialty VARCHAR(50),
    provider_location VARCHAR(100),
    provider_contact VARCHAR(20)
)
